name: Stargazer (itch) (Don Bisdorf)
description:
You own a bar on a rough-and-tumble space station. Your mission: serve customers, upgrade your drinks, food, and services, and eventually earn enough to pay off your loan. Criminal gangs and corrupt station cops will keep squeezing you for more and more cash: can you keep your head above water, or will you find yourself bankrupt in deep space?

This is a short prototype, and a full playthrough probably won't take more than an hour or two. I haven't decided whether I'll add anything more to this version of the game, but let me know if you find any bugs and I'll try to address them.
